title: I Remember Your Temperature
overview: It tells the story of the growth and love of jewelry designer Gu Nanxi. Gu Nanxi was in a car accident before the jewelry design competition, lost her sense of touch and was abandoned by her ex-boyfriend Xiao Rui. Three years later, Gu Nanxi returned to China, but her sense of touch had not fully recovered, and she was struggling in the design industry. By chance, she met the well-known artist Qin Shiqi, and with the help of Qin Shiqi, her sense of touch miraculously recovered. Gu Nanxi went to work at Keger Jewelry, where her ex-boyfriend Xiao Rui worked, and found that Xiao Rui not only abandoned her, but also stole her design results. Facing Xiao Rui's conspiracy, Gu Nanxi gradually won respect with her talent and perseverance, and fell in love with Qin Shiqi. However, their relationship encountered many obstacles, including the opposition of Gu Nanxi's best friend Qin Yufan and Xiao Rui's frame-up. Gu Nanxi finally won the championship of the 6th National Jewelry Design Competition with her strength, exposing Xiao Rui's true face, and overcame many difficulties with Qin Shiqi, harvested a beautiful love, and opened her own jewelry design studio.
